explanation: [0-0] In a convenience store, a man in a blue hoodie is standing in front of the beverage cooler, browsing the drinks on the shelves. The words "Normal people" are written at the top of the screen.

[0-6] The camera cuts to a close-up of the beverage cooler, showing rows of canned drinks, including the red-packaged "Dr Pepper" soda. The camera then cuts back to the man, who looks at the drink with an exaggerated expression of excitement. Immediately afterwards, the man picks up three cans of "Dr Pepper" soda from the shelf, then holds the three cans of soda and shows them with an excited expression.
